title: Mascara Lines
lyrics:
We've always loved the stranger things
Like vampires, the murder scenes
We dream of only black and white
There's cobwebs in our paradise
With scissors for hands and plastic hearts
We wait for the dawn to tear us apart

This valley's cold as the day that we left

We'll dance in the snow

I know you will miss him



But I think about you

All the time

All the time

(The good ones go too soon

The good ones go too soon)



So never mind the evil

This world is full of people that

Only exist to

Make us feel ugly



And never mind the terrors

We've got our house of horrors

Let's mummify the bodies

And burn all the money



'Cause I think about you

All the time

All the time

(The good ones go too soon)

And I wanna wake up to

Mascara lines

Oh darling, oh darling

(The good ones go too soon)



You bliss my dreams

You hold my nightmares

You are the ghost that shows up in the pictures

I'm missing your presence

You are the best that's ever happened



(The good ones go too soon)



We've always loved the stranger things

Like vampires, the murder scenes

We dream of only black and white

There's cobwebs in our paradise

With scissors for hands and plastic hearts

We wait for the dawn to tear us apart

This valley's cold as the day that we left

We'll dance in the snow

I know you will miss him



But I think about you

All the time

All the time

(The good ones go too soon)

And I wanna wake up to

Mascara lines

Oh darling, oh darling

(The good ones go too soon)



I think about you

All the time

All the time

(The good ones go too soon)

And I wanna wake up to

Mascara lines

Oh darling, oh darling

(The good ones go too soon)
